hero.title: ArcNxt Shipping, Delivery & Returns Policy
hero.subtitle: Deliver your products to customers across India with reliable and cost-effective shipping support.
hero.gstNoteText: You can still sell on ArcNxt. Learn more

banner.title: Deliver Products Across India
banner.desc: Deliver your products across India with reliable and affordable shipping, while ArcNxt takes care of the rest.

items.title: Shipping
items.desc: ArcNxt takes care of shipping and delivery so you can focus fully on selling. Only applicable 18% GST is charged on shipping, and you have complete control over your product pricing. With ArcNxt, you can reach customers across India, use a wide delivery network, and ship orders smoothly without managing logistics yourself.

items.title: Returns Management
items.desc: The ArcNxt Seller Dashboard gives you clear visibility into product returns, helping you understand issues quickly and take action in real time. This allows you to improve product quality, offer a better customer experience, and reduce unnecessary returns. You can easily manage all returns from one place and lower your overall return handling costs.

items.title: Cancellations
items.desc: ArcNxt does not charge penalties for genuine seller or system cancellations. If you are unable to fulfil an order due to stock issues or unexpected situations, you can cancel without worrying about extra charges. This allows you to run your business smoothly and without unnecessary pressure.

items.title: Return to Origin (RTO)
items.desc: Our delivery partner makes up to three delivery attempts to reach the customer. If the customer does not accept the order, it is marked as RTO (Return to Origin) and sent back as per policy. No return shipping charges are applied for such RTO orders, helping sellers save on extra return costs.

logistics.title: Shipping & Delivery Charges
logistics.desc: ArcNxt partners with multiple trusted logistics providers to pick up products from your location and deliver them directly to customers across India.

steps.title: Ship Your Orders in 3 Easy Steps

items.desc: Accept orders from the seller dashboard and download the shipping label.

items.title: Pack Products

items.title: Hand Over to Courier
items.desc: Our delivery partner picks up the order and delivers it to the customer.

charges.title: ArcNxt Shipping & Delivery Charges
paragraphs: ArcNxt provides cost-effective shipping across India through trusted logistics partners who pick up products from your location and deliver them directly to customers.
With transparent and affordable delivery charges, sellers can focus on growing their online business without worrying about logistics operations.

howItWorks.title: How to Ship Your Orders in 3 Simple Steps

steps.title: Manage and process your orders
steps.desc: Log in to the ArcNxt Seller Panel, accept orders, and download the shipping label and manifest.

steps.title: Pack your product for pickup
steps.desc: Pack the product securely using plain, unbranded packaging and attach the shipping label clearly.

steps.title: Hand over to delivery partner
steps.desc: Our logistics partner will pick up the shipment from your address and deliver it to the customer.

howItWorks.note: Sit back and focus on your business while ArcNxt and our delivery partners handle shipping and delivery safely and on time. When customers receive well-packed orders on time, they are more likely to return and place repeat orders, helping your business grow.

timeline.title: Shipping Timeline
timeline.desc: Orders should be shipped within 2‚Äì3 days from the date you receive the order, as per the delivery timeline you have agreed to (SLA). You can track the order status and remaining dispatch time from your ArcNxt seller dashboard. Once the order is booked, our delivery partner or courier partner will make up to three pickup attempts to collect your shipment.

returns.title: ArcNxt Return Policy
paragraphs: Customers can return a product within 5 days from the date of delivery. If an order is not delivered to the customer after delivery attempts, it is marked as RTO (Return to Origin) and sent back as per policy.

ArcNxt provides sellers with complete visibility into returns and RTO orders through the seller dashboard. You can view order-level and product-level return details, track shipment movement, and check payment and order history in one place. This helps you manage returns better and reduce return-related costs.

items.heading: Customer Returns
items.desc: If a customer returns a delivered product, a return shipping fee may apply based on the shipment‚Äôs weight and category.

items.heading: RTO (Return to Origin)
items.desc: If an order is not delivered to the customer and is returned as RTO, no additional return shipping charges are applied, helping sellers avoid extra costs.

items.heading: Tracking & Management
items.desc: All return and RTO-related details, including any applicable charges, can be easily tracked and managed from the ArcNxt seller dashboard.

items.heading: Exceptional Cases
items.desc: In certain special situations, return shipping charges may be fully or partially waived, as per ArcNxt policy.

cancellation.title: ArcNxt Cancellation Policy
cancellation.subtitle: No Cancellation Penalty
cancellation.desc: To ensure a good experience for customers, sellers are expected to keep their listed products in stock and ready for dispatch. However, we understand that delays or cancellations can sometimes happen due to reasons beyond your control. In such cases, ArcNxt does not charge any cancellation or late-dispatch penalties, allowing you to continue selling online without unnecessary stress or worry.
